name: CopyCats - Over and Out
description:
You studied this job for months, and you're ready to go. The night sets in and the museum is yours. Finally you will snatch away the precious Egyptian "cat eye" gemstone. Only problem, you broke your leg and so you have to get your cat friend to do it for you. He's now in control and you have to communicate to him how to complete the heist using commands, referencing only the aesthetic pieces featured in the museum.

A SUBMISSION FOR GMTK GAME JAM 2020

Credits:

Francisco Múrias, Cat wrangler, 3D Environment Art, 2D Pixel Art, 3D UI Design,  Game Design

Filipe Caserito, Paper cat and Game Design

Justin Vaughn, Big Cat and Engine Dev Lead

Enrico Degan, Menu Cat and Logo design

Polymake, Tom Cat, 3D Characters and Blueprint Scripting

Tim Przybylinski, Jazzy Cat Music Composer/Sound Design

Extra: Bart Kort - Extra Sound Effects
